options.description: specifies a filter to apply to the info fields of records, removes alleles which do not pass the filter
specifies a filter to apply to the genotype fields of records
used in conjunction with '-g', keeps variant info, but removes genotype
filter entire records, not just alleles
tag vcf records as positively filtered with this tag, print all records
tag vcf records as negatively filtered with this tag, print all records
append the existing filter tag, don't just replace it
apply -t on a per-allele basis. adds or sets the corresponding INFO field tag
use logical OR instead of AND to combine filters
specify a region on which to target the filtering, requires a BGZF compressed file which has been indexed with tabix. any number of regions may be specified.
